Function# sec_protocol_options_set_local_identity(_:_:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
func sec_protocol_options_set_local_identity(
    _ options: sec_protocol_options_t,
    _ identity: sec_identity_t
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_local_identity(_:_:)#parameters)

`options`A `sec_protocol_options_t` instance.

`identity`A `sec_identity_t` instance carrying the private key and certificate.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_local_identity(_:_:)#discussion)

Set the local identity to be used for this protocol instance.
